The decision of the Federal Court effectively rendered earlier decisions of the Controller of Housing in granting an extension of time to developers to deliver vacant possession as null and void. In Malaysia, a judgement of a court applies retrospectively, meaning that a new interpretation of the law would apply to situations or transactions that occurred before the judgement was delivered.
